did.abstract: Typescript list compiled by James D. Barton contains an introduction followed by lists giving opera title, production date, theater and stars. Within each title the arrangement is chronological.

scopecontent.p: Typescript list compiled by James D. Barton contains an introduction followed by lists giving opera title, production date, theater and stars. Within each title the arrangement is chronological.

prefercite.p: A list of the productions of the Gilbert and Sullivan operas in New York and other cities, Billy Rose Theatre Division, The New York Public Library
